headline: Allstate announces preferred dividends payable April 15, 2026
summary: The Allstate Corporation (NYSE: ALL) declared approximately $29.3 million in aggregate dividends on three series of preferred stock for the dividend period from Jan. 15, 2026, through April 14, 2026. All the preferred dividends are payable in cash on April 15, 2026, to stockholders of record at the close of business on March 31, 2026, as follows:

headline: Best car insurance for low-mileage drivers
summary: If you drive fewer than 10,000 miles per year, a pay-per-mile or usage-based insurance plan could be right for you. Here are our favorites.
